ygData.subject: Re: It was worth a try
ygData.msgSnippet: Lady Hawks eye picked up movement behind her, Battera was following carefully. Lady Hawk laughed a little. Walking an appropriate distance behind royalty?

Lady Hawks eye picked up movement behind her, Battera was following 
carefully. Lady Hawk laughed a little. "Walking an appropriate 
distance behind royalty? maybe theres some hope for that peasant yet.-
-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Battera::
> She watched and followed Zardus and LadyHawk to the lab.  She 
> couldn't stand this bot at all."
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Zardus::
> > 
> > Zardus nods, looking at Lady Hawk. Something about her felt 
> strange, 
> > like she was hiding something...
> > 
> > "I'll advise you to be more careful in the future," he 
> says, "Outside 
> > rank means very little on this planet. A simple Predacon could 
> > easilly become ruler of a giant faction. I'll show you to the 
lab, 
> > but be careful. The ship will be watching you closely."
> > 
> > He turns around, motioning for Lady Hawk to follow as he walks 
into 
> > the ship, heading for the labs.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > "Lady Hawk saw Zardus exit the ship "I meant no disrespect 
> towards 
> > > your lackey she just needed to be educated in manners when 
> > > associating with higher stature." she could tell by the way 
> Zardus 
> > > carried himself that he was a bot who wasn't impressed 
> easily. "If 
> > > you would show me to one of your labs I'll demonstrate some of 
my 
> > > findings." she'd hoped that he wasn't a scientist or he might 
see 
> > > through her deception and know that she was usingsomeone elses 
> > > technology.
